title: League of Legends install problem please help
body:
Hello. I have been trying to reinstall LoL on my laptop, which has Windows 10. Every time that I try to install LoL the same thing happens. An error screen shows up saying PVP.net Patcher Kernel hs stopped working. Windows tries to fix it, but it never works. Please, if you have a solution to this problem, tell me. Thank you

--greenhippo56

replies.body: Typically that kernel error is a good sign that Windows is blocking League from running the way it's supposed to. We can fix this pretty easily, but you'll need to double check your [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure Windows recognizes that League is a safe program to run!

I guess i just had to run as administator 
thanks for the help
